metadata.title: Pantry Directory Organization Handoff
metadata.purpose: Formal handoff for reviewing and organizing the kitchen pantry ingredients directory

current_status.directory_structure: App-centric structure created under kitchen/pantry/ingredients/ with subfolders for base, automatic1111, comfyui, n8n, penpot, openwebui, each with tools, skills, tasks, modules.
current_status.file_migration: Most ingredient files have been moved to their appropriate app/type subfolders. Some legacy or scattered files may remain.
current_status.cleanup: Old empty directories have been removed. No directories with files were deleted.

next_agent_tasks: Audit all files in kitchen/pantry/ingredients/ and subfolders.
Move any remaining files to the correct app/type subfolder.
If unsure about a file, move to base/ or create a legacy/ folder for review.
Update or create README.json describing the structure and conventions.
Document any files or directories that could not be confidently categorized.
Summarize actions and issues in the changelog and this handoff.
dependencies: No blocking dependencies. All required directories exist.
Some files may need review for correct categorization.
success_criteria: All ingredient files are grouped by app and type.
No files are left in legacy or root locations.
Structure is ready for hundreds/thousands of ingredients.
notes: If any files are ambiguous, document them for review rather than deleting. Prioritize maintainability and future scalability.
